title: Account takeover due to misconfiguration
vulnerability_information:
## Summary:

HI team, i hope you are good :)

Its a very simple logical flaw that results in this

So suppose we are victim@gmail.com , now login into the website then

1. go to account settings and then change mail address to victim111@gmail.com
2. a link will be sent to victim111@gmail.com, now the user realizes that he have lost access to victim111@gmail.com due to some reasons 
3. so he will probably change mail to the another mail address for e.g victim999@gmail.com which he owns and has access to
4. but it is found that even after verifying victim999@gmail.com, the old link which was sent to victim111@gmail.com is active, so user/attacker having access to that mail can verify it and takeover acc


In a nutshell : 

It is mandatory for a web app to invalidate the tokens in time to secure its user 

In this case, suppose while changing mail address the user mistakenly typed wrong mail address, so the link will be sent to that mail address. 

So the user probably don't want the user of that mail address to verify it, so he will quickly change his mail address to one he owns and verify it

what he doesn't know is that even after verification(change of major state), the old link is still active 

the flaw :

user changes mail to attacker@gmail.com -> user realizes that he mistyped the mail -> so he again changes to mail he owns and verifies it -> old link sent to attacker@gmail.com is still active even after new mail has been verified

## Impact

An attacker can takeover acc due to misconfiguration, not invalidation of tokens at major state change, in time

weakness.name: Use of a Key Past its Expiration Date

activities.message:
Thank you for your report. We will investigate the issue as soon as possible and shall let you know if we need any more information. Once validated, we will let you know and triage the issue.  

Best regards and happy hunting!
and also @rohitesh_mattermost  password reset feature are correctly implemented when i tried same thing
hi @rohitesh_mattermost  if u are looking for a reference here it is https://hackerone.com/reports/17474

Thanks for reporting this vulnerability. We have reviewed your report and after internally assessing the finding, we have determined that it is a valid issue. We would like to thank you for bringing this to our attention. Your report will be rewarded soon once we have discussed this further. Please stay tuned.

Best regards and happy hunting!
hi @rohitesh_mattermost  thanks for the triage :) and looking forward!
@rohit_mattermost any update?

Thank you for reporting this vulnerability. After internally reviewing your finding, we have determined that it is a valid low risk issue. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Congratulations!! We look forward to more additional reports from you. 

Best regards and happy hunting!
hi @rohitesh_mattermost  can you please invite @hackforgood to this report? i want to donate 10$ from my bounty :)

Hi @akash-hamal 

Unfortunately bounty splitting is not enabled for this program. Feel free to email hackers@hackerone.com 

https://hackerone.com/hackforgood
@rohitesh_mattermost  i have mailed them :) thanks for the mail
Thanks for reporting!
@rohitesh_mattermost full disclosure please :), would be glad!
would be glad if we can disclose it right now as i dont think we need to wait for 30 days!

Hi @akashhamal0x01 

The issue was patched in the version 5.38 released on 16th August. As per our responsible disclosure policy, the issue can only be disclosed after 30 days. So request you to please wait until then. 

Thanks
@rohitesh_mattermost thanks for the update and thanks for the swag :) much appreciated!

hi @rohitesh_mattermost  its been 2 months since i was rewarded swag and there is no news regarding it . i would be glad if you can provide me tracking number for the swag :) and status update ! thanks :)

Hi @akashhamal0x01

Apologies for the delay in dispatching your swag due to some logistics issue. We are working on it and will let you know as soon as its dispatched in the next couple of weeks. Thanks in advance for understanding.

been months, @rohitesh_mattermost any update on swag mate?
take care!

Hi @akashhamal0x01 
I confirmed with the team that the swag has been sent to the below address on 1st January 2022. So ideally you should have received it by now on the below mentioned address. At times, there might be some delay due to the customs clearance. 

`████████`

Thanks

@rohitesh_mattermost thanks but can u delete address above now? because this report is publicly disclosed and it violates my privacy.

Can i get shipment number? or tracking number? would be glad :) cause it will be easy for me to track as i no longer live there and have shifted to other city

Hi @akashhamal0x01 

My sincere apologies. I did not realize that the report was public. I have redacted the information. I will try to get the shipment/tracking number. But since this report is public now, I will send an email to your hackerone alias once I have it.
@rohitesh_mattermost  i have found the parcel :) thank you for the swag!

Thanks @akashhamal0x01 for letting us know. 

Happy hunting!

hi @rohitesh_mattermost , thanks. I was rewarded a swag again and its been 2 months as u can see but i have not received it. Can you provide me tracking link (don't forget to redact it as the report is already public) or just mail me the link at akashhamal0x01@wearehackerone.com :) thanks!
